dk2:11: lobhaḥ alobhaḥ atha cakṣuḥ saṁskṛtaṁ kumbhopamena |
dk2:13: saṁskārapratyayaṁ vijñānaṁ katamad | āha | yatha tāval lobhasahajāṁ vedanāṁ pratītya lobhasahajasya vijñānasyābhinirvṛttir bhavati prādurbhāvaś ca dveṣasahajāṁ mohasahajāṁ vedanāṁ pratītya mohasahajasya vijñānasyābhinirvṛttir bhavati prādurbhāvaḥ | tad ucyate saṁskārapratyayaṁ vijñānaṁ | api khalu cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi cotpadyate cakṣurvijñānaṁ | tatra cakṣuḥsaṁskṛtaṁ rūpāṇi ca bāhyaṁ pratyayaṁ cakṣurvijñānasya tad ucyate saṁskārapratyayaṁ vijnānaṁ | śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanaḥ pratītya dharmāṁś cotpadyate manovijñānaṁ | tatra manaḥsaṁskṛtaṁ dharmāś ca bāhyaṁ pratyayaṁ manovijñānasya tad ucyate saṁskārapratyayaṁ vijñānaṁ | api khalv evam uktaṁ bhagavatā kumbhopamesmin vyākaraṇe |
dk2:14: tasya puṇyān saṁskārān abhisaṁskṛtya puṇyopagaṁ bhavati vijñānaṁ | apuṇyān āniṁjyān saṁskārān abhisaṁskṛtyāniṁjyopagaṁ bhavati vijñānaṁ |
dk2:15: katham apuṇyaṁ | āha | yathā khalv ihaikatyo rāgaparyavasthito dveṣaparyavasthito mohaparyavasthitaḥ kāyena duścaritaṁ carati vācā manasā duścaritaṁ carati | iti ye te akuśalāḥ kāyasaṁskārā vāksaṁskārā manaḥsaṁskārā ima ucyante ’puṇyāḥ saṁskārāḥ | yad api taddhetos tatpratyayaṁ kāyasya bhedān narakeṣūpapadyate | tatra ca vijñānam abhinirvartayati | evam apuṇyān saṁskārān abhisaṁskṛtyāpuṇyopagaṁ vijñānaṁ bhavati |
dk2:17: kathaṁ puṇyān abhisaṁskārān abhisaṁskṛtya puṇyopagaṁ bhavati vijñānaṁ | āha | yathā khalv ihaikatyo manuṣyasukhakeṣv avekṣāvān bhavati pratibaddhacittaḥ | vistareṇa yāvat | tatra ca vijñānam abhinirvartayati | evaṁ puṇyān saṁskārān abhisaṁskṛtya puṇyopagaṁ bhavati vijñānaṁ |
dk2:18: yathā manuṣyasukhakānām evaṁ yāvat paranirmitavaśavartināṁ brahmakāyikānāṁ viviktaṁ kāmair viviktaṁ tatra ca vijñānam abhinirvartayati | (about 65–70 akṣaras illegible)
dk2:20: katham āniṁjyān saṁskārān abhisaṁskṛtyāniṁjyopagaṁ bhavati vijñānaṁ | āha | yathā khalv ihaikatya ākāśānantyāyatanānāṁ devānām avekṣāvān bhavati pratibaddhacitto vistareṇa tatra ca vijñānam abhinirvartayati | evaṁ yāvan naivasaṁjñānāsaṁjñāyatanānām iti yāvad vijñānaṁ saṁskārān āgamya vistaraḥ ||
